stimulusHtml:
If ∫ a b f ( x ) d x = 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@465F@ and  ∫ a b g ( x ) d x = − 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4749@ , which of the following must be true?

I. f ( x ) > g ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4144@ for a ≤ x ≤ b MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F4F@

II. ∫ a b ( f ( x ) + g ( x ) ) d x = 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4C79@

III. ∫ a b ( f ( x ) g ( x ) ) d x = − 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4E31@
